Make Site df
```{r}
rd6<- vv %>%
  filter(site %in% "RD")

c2<- vv %>%
  filter(site %in% "C2")

bo<- vv %>%
  filter(site %in% "BO")
```

Plot Vv at C2
```{r}
c2_vv<- c2 %>% ggplot() + geom_line(
  aes(x = date,
      y = copies_mL),
  color = "darkred") +
  geom_point(
    aes(x = date,
      y = copies_mL),
  color = "darkred")+
  theme_bw() +
  labs(x = "Date",
       y = "Copies/mL",
       title = "Vv at Canals") +
  theme(plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.5))


c2_vv
```

All sites
```{r}
all<- vv %>% 
  mutate(site = recode(site, "BO" = "Blind Oso",
                              "C2" = "Canals",
                              "RD" = "Gulf")) %>%
  ggplot() + geom_line(
    aes(x = date,
        y = copies_mL,
        color = site)) + 
  scale_color_manual( values = c("Blind Oso" = "darkgreen",
                                "Canals" = "darkred",
                                "Gulf" = "darkblue"))+
  theme_bw()+
  facet_wrap(~site)+
  labs(
    x = "Date", 
    y = "Copies/mL",
    title = "Vibrio vulnificus Levels Across Dust Time Series: Trial 1")+
  theme(
    legend.position = "none",
    axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 45, hjust = 1),
    plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.5)) 
  
all
```
